2.07.name: wordpress/fs-shopping-cart
2.07.description:
The FireStorm eCommerce Plugin is an easy to use shopping cart plugin. The plugin converts your WordPress website into a professional online store. Products are not tied to blog posts allowing you to keep the store and blog separate. This WordPress eCommerce plugin is ideal for any type of online store. Discounts and promotions can be offered to customers via coupon codes or automatic discounts. This shopping cart plugin was designed with search engine optimization in mind so store pages are optimized for Google search results. Further expandable functions can be downloaded from our website.

Related Links:

  • eCommerce Plugin Homepage
  • Plugin Customization & Theme Development
